name: Setup Claude Opus 4.6 on OpenClaw
steps: Add 'models' section with 'anthropic' provider and 'claude-opus-4-6' model config (reasoning: true, contextWindow: 1000000, maxTokens: 128000)
Add 'agents' section with default model set to 'anthropic/claude-opus-4-6' and fallbacks to 'anthropic/claude-opus-4-5'
